author: Mehera Bonner
title: Watch Real Life "Hidden Figure" Katherine Johnson's Moving Appearance at 2017 Oscars (Video)
text: By Mehera Bonner Feb 26, 2017 Oscar nominated film Hidden Figures tells the true story of black NASA employees Katherine G. Johnson, Dorothy Vaughan, and Mary Jackson—who made John Glenn's orbit into space possible. Their story was largely unknown before the film (hence the title), which has finally catapulted them to the fame they deserve. Sadly Vaughan and Jackson are no longer alive, but Johnson made an appearance at the Oscars alongside actresses Octavia Spencer, Janelle Monáe, and Taraji P. Henson—who plays her in the film.
